patthana21.27:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.27:1.1_1: Nanahetuṁ naparittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu paritto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.27:1.1_2: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.27:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ namahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu mahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.27:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ naappamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu appamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
